codeList:
# Download Milvus 2.6.1+
$ wget https://github.com/milvus-io/milvus/releases/latest
# Configure Tiered Storage
$ vi milvus.yaml
queryNode.segcore.tieredStorage:
  warmup:
    scalarField: disable
    scalarIndex: disable
    vectorField: disable
    vectorIndex: disable
  evictionEnabled: true
# Launch Milvus
$ docker-compose up -d

anchorList.label: Perché il caricamento completo si interrompe su larga scala
